title: Fairy Tales for Bad Girls
description: Stories & Poems to keep you warm at night . . . steamy versions of fairy tales you thought you knew and a few you’ve never heard before. Goldilocks telling her hard-working side of the story, the Little Old Woman fulfilling shoe fetishes, Little Red writing her way into trouble, Lucifer’s Daughter wreaking havoc on the townspeople . . . these fairy tales are for women who know what they want and go after it.Join the contest! http://www.littleoffcenterpress.com/c...
author: J. Lynnes
